attributes.comment:
These fees will also impact families that are adopting children internationally.
Many of them are having to pay the fees twice because the USCIS approval forms
and fingerprinting expire before these families are able to complete their
adoptions. For example, people adopting from China are currently waiting about
20 months to travel to China to get their children. The I-717H form, allowing a US
citizen to adopt a child from a foreign country and bring them back to the states,
expires after 18 months. Thousands of American families are already paying the
USCIS twice to adopt the same child. Increasing the fees is adding insult to
injury.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Amy
